feed.title: Good Hope Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Good Hope Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:59 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Watson Lake Airport 4:25 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: ESE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow this afternoon. Amount 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
